faq.question: How is APEX different from other online coaching?
faq.answer: We combine evidence-based programming with genuine accountability. Every protocol is built on peer-reviewed research, and our coaches hold advanced certifications. We don't do cookie-cutter — your program evolves based on your biofeedback and progress data.

faq.question: What equipment do I need?
faq.answer: Foundation and Elite programs are designed for commercial gyms with standard equipment (barbells, dumbbells, cables, machines). We can adapt for home gym setups with advance notice. APEX Private includes equipment-specific customization.

faq.question: How much time do I need per week?
faq.answer: Most programs require 4-5 training sessions of 60-75 minutes each. Total weekly commitment including meal prep and check-ins: approximately 6-8 hours. Elite and APEX programs can be adjusted for busier schedules.

faq.question: Do you provide nutrition plans?
faq.answer: All programs include nutrition guidance. Foundation provides macro targets and guidelines. Elite includes custom calculations and bi-weekly adjustments. APEX Private features full meal planning if desired.

faq.question: What results can I realistically expect?
faq.answer: Results vary based on starting point, adherence, and genetics. Typical 12-week results: 10-20 lbs fat loss OR 5-10 lbs muscle gain. Our 97% goal achievement rate is among clients who complete the full program with 80%+ adherence.

pricing.title: Choose Your Protocol
pricing.subtitle: All programs include the APEX app, progress tracking, and community access.

conversion.headline: Ready to Start Your Transformation?
conversion.subhead: Book your free Performance Assessment. We'll evaluate your current state, discuss your goals, and recommend the optimal protocol for your situation.
